title: Making a Mochaccino with the Ninja Coffee Bar™
description:
Greg shows you how easy it is to make a delicious mochaccino, just one of Ninja’s many frozen blended specialty drinks.

Learn more about the Ninja Coffee Bar™ at http://www.ninjacoffeebar.com. 

Get recipes for your Ninja Coffee Bar at http://www.ninjakitchen.com/recipes.
